title: Ilia Garden
about: Ilia Garden (formerly Rose Garden) is located on Agmashenebeli Avenue in Tbilisi. It is a perfect place to relax and unwind. The tree-lined garden features walking paths, wooden rest places, and small pools that create a pleasant and attractive environment. There are also childrenâ€™s attractions in the park, so here you will be able to spend a fun and varied day with your little ones. There is also an open-air cinema - Grine, where you can watch movies during the warm season.
